name: WorkFlowy [stuff removal]
description:
Removes following WorkFlowy.com elements:
1) starred pages feature
2) bottom links
3) "Go pro" and "Get more space" buttons
Works well with my other styles: style 125601 style 125596 style 125598 style 125597
additional_info:
VERSION 2, 4.8.2016

- double scrollbar bug fix

VERSION 1, 15.3.2016

- initial release
